chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In today's video, we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why Core Web Vitals are necessary.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Like this video and keep high energy.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The thing is that your website should be in your iPhone, iPad, Android, Surface Pro 4 devices.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Because we have to give good experience to all users through our website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In this video, we will also learn about Chrome's hidden tool which is called Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And how you can use it to enhance your website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So write in the comment section, Sigma Batch OP.

chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So guys, I have come to my computer screen.

chunks.text: And I will make a new folder which is called Video 6.

chunks.text: Video 6.

chunks.text: And in Video 6, I will click on VS Code as always.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And today, I will tell you about SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First of all, I want to tell you what SEO is.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can see any website and it is called SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Let's take an example of Amazon.in.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I opened Amazon.in.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So Amazon.in needs to be loaded as soon as possible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that they can get their products in the search.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google is a search engine.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google's responsibility is to show good pages to users.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So Google will only show those pages which will be fast.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Information is very good.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And along with that, there are some things that are good for users.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, there are two pages from the editor.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: One page has told about dog food.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The other page has also told exactly about dog food.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But among these two, page 2 is very fast and loads well.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So Google will give more preference to it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Along with that, there are core web vitals which Google considers to rank two pages.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First of all, there is content.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Content is the most important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you have content on the other page, then you can rank it without the code web vitals.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But if you are competing with a page with almost the same content,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then you will see core web vitals.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And if your core web vitals are good, then you will be given preference.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So the first thing that comes in core web vitals is your CLS.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You see this video here which I have run on the web.dev website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You will see that someone comes to your website and he is ordering to cancel it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So the time he canceled it, the above thing became visible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And he shifted the layout.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the order was completed.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But the user wanted to click on the top if the order was not complete.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In this way, the user experience is very bad.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And as you saw in this video, this shouldn't happen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So our CLS should be at least.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now what is the definition of CLS?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Cumulative layout shift means how much the age is shifting while loading.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose you have loaded the page and you get to see this first.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This was above and after that, when this part of the term was loaded,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then all this shifted down.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The layout shouldn't shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you put vit and ride in images, then the layout shouldn't shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And LCP stands for largest contextual paint.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This means that if a user is viewing a page, then the biggest element is on it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, the biggest part of this image is loading in how long.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Meaning the entire page will be loaded.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But the biggest element which is most important is loading in how long.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The meaning of web.dev and Google should have a good LCP score of 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Meaning the biggest element should be loaded in 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: After this comes the third metric which is FID.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Which stands for first input delay.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First input delay means that if a user clicks on an input element like button

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: or any type of input is given on a page, then how long does that input process?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, if you click on a button, then the button click browser processes in how long?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the meaning of Google and web.dev should start processing at least 100 milliseconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So these were three core web vitals which are very important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you about the information that these core web vitals are updated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But these three are very important and you should know.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now I will show you what light house report is and why it is generated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And how these three core web vitals value will be given from there.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So I will tell you here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you will inspect it right click and if you can see it on the right side, then you can click here and run it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can bring it here again and you can run it here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I prefer to see it down because it is my habit to see it from the beginning.

chunks.text: Now here you can see the option of light house.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Light house basically generates a report and tells you what can be improved in your HTML page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, if I want to see in mobile that how mobile users see my website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So I will click on mobile or I will click on desktop and I will close this tab.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.text: Performance, accessibility, best practices, SEO and PWA are all shown here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That is the scope of improvement in the page.

chunks.text: Now here you can see that properly size your images.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: 2.7 seconds fast your website can be loaded.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So all these suggestions are given to you by light house.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And if you incorporate these suggestions, then your website will be loaded very well and the user will have a good experience.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now you can see here that image elements do not have explicit width and height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So you should give width and height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The width and height attribute of image that we had read in the previous video should be used.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that it is reserved in your browser.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: When we set width and height in HTML, then space in the browser is reserved.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Otherwise, if we do not set height and width, then what will happen that our browser will not tell us how much space we have to reserve.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the longer the CSS load, the lower the page will shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So we do not want our page to shift during loading time.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If our page starts shifting, then if we click here, then when it will shift from the wrong side, then it can be done.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So this kind of shift is not preferred at all.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google does not prefer at all.
